ItemTemplate.Name: Content Part
ItemTemplate.Description: Generates a general content part and its necessary files in the project: part itself, full driver, empty handler, display and editor shape templates. IMPORTANT: Make sure that you selected the project root. NOTE: Placement.info is not generated or appended.

ItemTemplate.Name: Content Part with Record
ItemTemplate.Description: Generates a content part with a record and its necessary files in the project: part itself with record, full driver, empty handler, display and editor shape templates, migrations. IMPORTANT: Make sure that you selected the project root. NOTE: Placement.info is not generated or appended.
